title: Afonso Mendes de Melo
text:
Afonso Mendes de Melo (1240-1280) 2nd Lord of Melo, was a medieval <a href="knight">knight</a>, rico-homem (rich-men) of the Kingdom of Portugal.
He was born in Portugal, the son of <a href="Mem%20Soares%20de%20Melo%2C%201st%20Lord%20de%20Melo">Mem Soares de Melo, 1st Lord de Melo</a> and Teresa Afonso Gato, daughter of <a href="Afonso%20Pires%20Gato">Afonso Pires Gato</a> and Urraca Fernandes de Lumiares. His wife was Inês Vasques, daughter of Vasco Lourenço da Cunha.
